column1: picked off the pads behind square for three
just short of a length and angling in at off, punched straight to mid-off
pretty full and swinging into the pads, squeezed to square leg
down the track and forced wide of mid-off
full on the stumps, punched to mid-on
Livingstone shimmies out, swings wildly to the leg side, and instead cops it on the thigh pad to close out the over
on a length and outside off, 138ks, but the ball doesn't quite come onto the bat. Roy aims to punch on the up but can only scoop a catch to extra-cover. First-ball wicket for Wildermuth
pitched up on middle and leg, knocked to mid-on
dug in short on middle, quietly played back to the bowler
Munro dashes down the track, meets a length ball early, picks it from outside off and belts it straight of mid-on
Livingstone uses his feet, Wildermuth drags his length back, off the pad and rolls behind towards short fine leg
full on middle, and crunched straight past the bowler. Sliding effort in the deep stops the four
good length on middle and leg, and going down the leg side
good length just outside off. Drops his hands and off they go for a single
length ball on middle, and punched to cover
length ball on leg. Swipes leg side, hits his hip and rolls behind. They scamper across for a single

up in the air and it lands safe behind the keeper after a massive air time. Length ball on middle and he goes for a leg-side swipe but it takes the edge. Would've hit the roof if there was one, say the TV commentators
good length on middle and angling across. Skips down the ground and slaps a shot past cover
good length, on leg stump. Tapped to midwicket
straight as an arrow In the slot, on off stump, and he holds the pose while lofting it over the umpire
full on off, and he comes down the ground and whips it off his hips, over squareish fine leg!
good length, outside off. Punched to cover off the back foot
against the run of play! Length ball on off and he looks to flick it behind square, but it goes squarer than he'd like. Man in the deep slides and finds the only man on the boundary there
hits a hard length, Munro jabs it off an inside edge
drilled to short cover, where there is a half-save
whipped with the angle to the right of midwicket
on the pads, squeezed through midwicket
back of a length and slanting in at off, played back to the right of the bowler
shortish on off, punched down to long-on
short and skidding across off, swing and a miss
near-yorker on leg stump, stabbed back
short and slanting into middle, tucked off back foot trough midwicket
Morkel hits the splice, jammed to mid-off
back of a length and skidding into ping the pad, and roll away. Heading down leg
lofted down to long-on
on a length and straightens in the channel to beat the outside edge
pitched up on off, squeezed to mid-off
stabbed past the bowler to mid-on
low full-toss on middle, patted away down to wide long-off
Inglis steps away outside leg, manufactures room and launches it imperiously over extra-cover
low full-toss on off, clipped to deep square leg
pretty full on middle, driven smoothly to long-off
back of a length on middle, guided to point
shovelled away in the air...doesn't carry to deep midwicket
dug in short on off, but not short enough to trouble Inglis. He swivels on the back foot and pummels a pull to the right of deep midwicket. Bam
really full and outside off, dragged to deep midwicket off the inside half
worked away to wide long-on
shortish and outside off, chopped away to sweeper cover off the back foot
drilled through the line to cover
hip-high short ball, angling into off stump, Inglis leans back, picks it up and swats it powerfully to the midwicket boundary. Pinged off the middle of the bat
Inglis threatens to make room by stepping away outside leg, Wildermuth shifts his line wider of off. Left alone in the end. Wide
pitched up and outside off, tapped down to long-off
back of a length on middle, powered down to long-off
back of a length and straighter lines again from Wildermuth, clipped through midwicket
tapped down to long-on and that's time for drinks
hip-high short ball to Munro, you've got to get it up higher to Munro, short-armed away for four
whipped straight to deep square leg this time
very full and angling into off, whisked away to wide long-on
slower ball, short on off, lashed away through the off side
on the hips, Munro picks it up and deposits it over the backward square-leg fence. Clears the man in the deep
full-toss on leg or outside leg, deflected away off the pads towards covers
overpitched on the pads, flicked away to deep midwicket
back of a length and seams back in from outside off, Bancroft swishes and misses
full-toss, speared on middle, inside-edged through square leg
very full on middle, scythed away to sweeper
Bancroft makes some room and slices it to sweeper cover. The X-factor sub comes into play again
on a length and on off, played back
slower ball, full and wide, swished to long-off
short and rising at the body, he rides the bounce, drops the ball to the leg side and comes back for the second
tip and run to cover
full-toss on middle, Munro camps back and slices it over extra-cover
full-toss on the hips, Munro picks it up and shovels it with the bottom hand over square leg for another six
that's an encore. Gregory errs on the pads once again although he manages to land this ball. Picked up and flicked over midwicket this time
full and outside off, tapped down the ground
on a length and outside off, squeezed down to long-off
mighty full and wide outside off, Munro reaches out for the ball and flays it over backward point
back of a length on middle, Munro aims for a reverse-hit but misses
slower length ball on the leg stump, Munro picks it up and smashes it over the wide long-on fence
full-toss on middle, shovelled away to wide long-on
follows him with a back of a length ball outside leg stump, Turner flicks to short leg
slower ball from around the wicket. Munro slogs all around it and misses completely

that's an incredible shot! It's almost a scoop but in front of the wicket. Munro is totally off balance and the ball is well outside off as well - meant to steal what's left of his little balance - but he somehow reaches out and swipes the ball over mid-on
cuts the back of a length ball outside off through point
stays around the wicket to the right-hander too, looking for the blockhole. Turner is set up deep in his crease and whacks it to deep midwicket

taken at cover. Outstanding over from Morkel under pressure. He knows he has to keep the ball away from Munro's reach. He backs his slower balls to mess with his timing as well. This one combines to two. A short, very wide, change of pace delivery that robs Munro of his hitting power and he pops the ball straight to Denly
outside edge flies away to the third man boundary
length ball outside off, slogs it to deep midwicket
back of a length - but with pace off - Richardson swings and misses
another slower bouncer, Richardson is through with his shot too soon, Turner makes sure it doesn't end up a dot
slogs it to towards the midwicket boundary, but Bryant there saves the boundary... oh but wait, replays show he might just have been in contact with the rope while he was trying to pull it back
whacks it back down the ground, over mid-on. Turner's trademark power coming through. Brisbane Heat need 175 to win
full on fifth stump and a touch of away swing, beaten driving away from his body.
good length on fifth stump again with a touch of away movement, defended back to Richardson.

missed runout! Good length ball on off stump, tap and run in front of point for a sharp run. Lynn looked like he'd get in barely but his bat gets stuck in the turf trying to get it across the line, a direct hit would have had him short with the bat stuck inches short of the line.
full and wide, swings sharply as Lynn reaches far away to try to jab it through point, doesn't get anything on it and it continues swinging dramatically past the keeper to the third man rope.
good length ball on fourth stump, defended.
good length ball on fourth stump, prods away from his body and an inside edge goes to square leg.
good length ball on off, defended.
fullish length on fourth stump, drives hard and slices an edge wide of short third man and races to the rope.
good length ball on off, defended.

sharp catch at short extra cover! Behrendorff pitches it up full on fourth stump to encourage the drive, Bryant laces this crisply to the man Bancroft close in at about 16 yards and pays the price for getting under this ever so slightly. It never rose above knee height from the moment it left the bat but Bancroft gets low to pouch this at ankle height.
good length ball on off, defended.
back of a length on off, defended again to complete a tidy over. Just the one thickish edge to the rope but otherwise five dots on the money.
full and wide, Lynn goes to hammer this over cover and slices this high over point, cut off by the sweeper for a leisurely two.
hello! Full on middle, Lynn takes a step down the track and frees the arms for a Happy Gilmore drive high over the bowler into the sightscreen.
back of a length on fourth stump, slaps this drive flat through extra cover and chased down again at the rope for another long two.
good length ball jammed into the legs, Lynn can't flick this away.
short and wide, Lynn flays this over point, looked like it might be at a catchable height but it was placed perfectly in the gap between cover and backward point.

almost deja vu from earlier in the over. Only difference is he stays rooted to the crease instead of taking a wander down the track but takes the five-wood out of his bag and drives this high and deep down the ground into the sightscreen.
fullish length on off, guides this with soft hands behind point.
juicy meatball of a full toss wide outside off at thigh height, misses out on slapping this over cover. No ball called, possibly for an overstep because this looked well below waist height.
full and speared into the feet, can't flick this away off the bat and it trickles away off the pads for a leg bye.
back of a length on off stump, chops this into the off side for one.
back of a length, chops at this into the ground but can't get this through the ring.
full on the stumps, punches this with a full face and high elbow back over the bowler down the ground.
flighted full on off, charges first ball and hacks at this mistiming it through mid-on.
googly lands short on fifth stump and spins in, cuts this through point to the sweeper.
lands this short on fifth stump, Lynn backs away to cut to the cover sweeper.
short on sixth stump, goes back to punch to the cover sweeper again.
fuller on fifth stump, Lynn doesn't hesitate to swat this flat over extra cover and the sweeper has no chance.

finally the plan to Lynn comes off! Charged Fawad once again in the over and this time Fawad darts it in flatter and wider on sixth stump, Lynn is beaten badly in flight and flails at this hoping to get some bat on it to survive but sends a stiff breeze back to Fawad instead of the ball. Simple stumping denied Lynn's effort to drag his back foot back in.
full on fourth stump, driven to long-on.
full on the legs, flicked behind square.
full on middle, chipped through midwicket.
good length ball on middle skids low, Burns jams the bat down late after going onto the back foot to cut.
short and wide, cut to the cover sweeper.
full on the legs, flicked to deep midwicket for a long single.
good length ball tapped through the ring.

bounced out! Tye bangs it in short on middle stump and Burns is hustled going to pull, top edge swirls over square leg, Inglis bolts immediately toward the square leg umpire, covers a good 30+ yards before taking the catch on the edge of the ring reaching out in front of his body. Superb effort covering as much ground as he did.
back of a length on off, punched behind point and they take on deep third man Richardson for an alert second.
slower ball lands way too short tailing down leg at 94.6 kph, almost bounces twice before it passes the batsman. Denly's timing is way off trying to pull, wide called.
good length ball on fourth stump, punched through the covers.
bouncer over off stump, leans back to let this pass.
short again, can't get this through the ring.
googly lands on fourth stump and spins in, flicked through the leg side.
quicker ball on fifth stump lands short to negate a charge, chops this through point.
fuller on fourth stump, defended into the covers.

in the air a long time but the fielder doesn't budge off the rope. Lands this short on fourth stump, pulls this flat toward deep midwicket, really should have been a chance but the man on the rope never moved an inch and let it land two yards in front of him. Poor read off the bat and Fawad is quietly steaming. For this standard, unacceptable not to at least get hands to the ball.
true half-tracker this time around and heaves this high and deep over square leg five rows back.
short and punched out to the sweeper wide enough for a pair.
back of a length on fifth stump, goes to punch through cover and beaten.
short on the stumps, pulled flat through midwicket.

full on the legs, flicks this to deep fine leg, should be a single but a terrible misfield by the man coming in off the rope and Gregory recognizes it's Fawad Ahmed always a chance for a fumble and calls Denly through for a second.
short on the stumps, pulls this into the ground to short midwicket.
full and wide, slices this high over backward point and it lands safely for a pair.

bouncer over middle, goes to pull and misses. Inglis goes wild appealing, more to throw the leg side umpire off from calling a wide on height than any other reason because bat was nowhere near the ball. It's deemed a legal delivery on height.
wide slower ball yorker on fifth stump at 120 kph, Denly plays over the top of it.
fullish length on middle at 141 kph, punched back down the pitch toward mid-on for one.
good length ball on middle, flicked to midwicket.
knee high full toss on sixth stump, slaps this off the toe of the bat to the cover sweeper.
fullish length on off stump, backs away from leg and carves a drive flat behind point, slapped back in by Richardson at the point sweeper rope to turn four into two.

drama! Length ball slapped back to Tye, who stabs it down left-handed in his follow through with a carom going toward mid-on, they scamper for the single to beat mid-on's direct hit at the striker's end by a yard. Bash Boost Point secured by the Heat!
full on the stumps, flicked to the leg side.
full on off, slices a drive to Richardson at short third man, they take him on for a tight single as he underhands this from the 30-yard ring toward the stumps dealing with his dodgy shoulder.
full into the pads, tries to flick this away and misses, stifled lbw appeal.
full pace ball attempted full on the stumps, Gregory shuffles down and drives this high over the bowler, barely lands past the rope.
full on the stumps, tries to flick this away off the pads but toe jams this toward the keeper.
full on the stumps, flicks this high and wide toward long-on. Drops well short of the fielder and they run two.
full on the stumps, defended to midwicket.
yorker passes in between leg stump and the batsman backing away, can't punch it out.
slower ball tails full and way down leg, no chance for the keeper to stop this diving left.
short and wide, slaps this hard to the cover sweeper.
full and tailing down leg again, this time just flicks this pads missing a whip to midwicket but Inglis again has no chance after the deflection and deep fine leg is way too square to cut this off.

fortunate for Behrendorff as it comes off the pads heading well down leg and caroms back onto the stumps. Really it was another poor delivery angled down past leg stump, but Gregory didn't really do enough to create the room to flick this away and it comes off the pads and then redirects back onto the stumps.
fullish length ball, defended.
full on leg stump, goes to sweep and misses, solid shout for lbw but given not out, and even more surprisingly given as runs off the bat. Was clearly off the thigh guard.
full and chopped into the off side.
full and slapped back to Fawad.
full on fourth stump, slaps a drive off an inside edge into midwicket. Fielder relays to the keeper and Denly just beats the relay. A direct hit might have been dicey.

skiddy delivery pierces Denly and crashes into middle stump. Fawad unleashed the googly and it landed short on off stump but kept quite low as Denly went back to pull this high over midwicket. Instead it doesn't bounce as he expected and shoots low under the shot to light up the stumps.
flighted full on off, punched down the ground to long-on.
short on the stumps, goes back to flick through square leg.

sharp captaincy pays off! Livingstone's part-time spin burgles a wicket! Good length ball on fourth stump, tries to back away to cut this through point but the variable bounce for the spinners is causing problems and a thin edge is well held by Inglis.

nearly a hat-trick ball for Livingstone! Fullish length ball on off and Bazley chips this gently toward long-off, Behrendorff charges in and lunges forward but it just barely short hops him before richocheting away to allow the second.
short and punched through the ring.
good length ball and slaps this along the ground through the ring again.
short and wide, goes to cut and beaten.
full on off, punched to long-off.
full on fifth stump, punched into the covers.
full and wide, hammers a drive through the covers and with the field up in the Power Surge it races away.

Richardson wins the cat and mouse game. Yorker on middle, Peirson goes too far across his stumps trying to flick this to the leg side and struck dead in front of middle, straightforward decision for the umpire to uphold Richardson's appeal.
yorker on middle, dug out to backward point.

slapped to cover on the ring. Power Surge is instead leading to a Power Outage. Richardson bangs this in short on fourth stump, Steketee tries to carve it over the ring but doesn't get the elevation, simple catch taken at chest height.
another one bites the dust caught on the ring. Length ball chipped tamely to mid-off, brief juggle before completing the catch.
wide yorker on sixth stump, punched to mid-off.
back of a length on fifth stump, misses the cut.
back of a length on off stump, punches this past backward point, misfield allows two.
full on the legs, sliced out to backward point.
back of a length on off, defended into the off side.
starts with a googly landing on a good length on leg, prods forward and a thick edge goes to short third man.
good length ball on the legs, goes back to flick into square leg.
full on off, goes back to defend, nearly backspins onto off stump.
flights this full on off, stretches forward to slog this for long-on but doesn't come close to clearing the man on the rope. Simple catch taken 15 yards in.
